Keeping his eyes closed, AzureBlade warned the other maximals.

AzureBlade: He is trying to wake up, but not as Condor. Sedate him 
again if you can, and be ready if it doesn't work.

Then, back to Nightstrike...

AzureBlade: Why deny who you are, Condor? And how do you explain that 
we maximals captured you even with our code of honor? You have lost 
power as a decepticon, Condor. It is now up to you to know if you want 
to regain it. However, you must know that remaining a Decepticon will 
spell your doom.

OOC: Yo hablo espanol!

guess

don't
